name: Lenme
description: Lenme is the first subscription-based, fully automated, peer-to-peer lending platform offering short-term and crypto-backed loans. We serve and connect borrowers with financial institutions, lending businesses, and individuals all via an app.
one_liner: Lenme is the first subscription-based, fully automated, peer-to-peer lending platform offering short-term and crypto-backed loans. We serve and connect borrowers with financial institutions, lending businesses, and individuals all via an app.
location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
